definition.name: Notify Slack Action
definition.description: Send Github Actions workflow status notifications to Slack
definition.author: RavSam Web Solutions

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Github Token for accessing workflow url

inputs.name: notification_title
inputs.description: Specify on the notification message title

inputs.name: message_format
inputs.description: Specify on the notification message format

inputs.name: footer
inputs.description: Specify the footer of the message

inputs.name: notify_when
inputs.description: Specify on which events a slack notification is sent

inputs.name: mention_users
inputs.description: Specify the slack IDs of users you want to mention

inputs.name: mention_users_when
inputs.description: Specify on which events you want to mention the users

inputs.name: mention_groups
inputs.description: Specify the slack IDs of groups you want to mention

inputs.name: mention_groups_when
inputs.description: Specify on which events you want to mention the groups

inputs.name: icon_success
inputs.description: Specify on icon to be used when event is success

inputs.name: icon_failure
inputs.description: Specify on icon to be used when event is failure

inputs.name: icon_cancelled
inputs.description: Specify on icon to be used when event is cancelled

inputs.name: icon_warnings
inputs.description: Specify on icon to be used when event is warnings

inputs.name: icon_skipped
inputs.description: Specify on icon to be used when event is skipped

evidence.reasoning: The action is designed to send notifications about GitHub Actions workflow status to Slack, which clearly falls under communication and notification categories.
